welcome_message_body: Welcome to Matadi, a charming city known for its stunning views of the Congo River and vibrant markets. We invite you to explore and enjoy the unique culture and beauty this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: chez pappa ingulu
restaurants.description: chez pappa ingulu is a african restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Alamir
restaurants.description: Alamir is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: chez maman julie
restaurants.description: chez maman julie is a african restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Matadi Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Matadi Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's wifi network for free with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boma Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal for a fee.
